snippet: Shares of Goldman Sachs rose as much as 4 percent in trading on Monday morning, as investors considered a bullish argument for the firm that appeared in Barron's this weekend.
abstract: Shares of Goldman Sachs rose as much as 4 percent in trading on Monday morning, as investors considered a bullish argument for the firm that appeared in Barron's this weekend.

headline.main: The Bullish Case for Goldman Sachs
